title: Guarding My Heart
description: Katrina is getting everything she has ever wanted and about to marry the love of her life until she has a devastating wake up call.  Three years on and it all still effects her deeply. Now only keeping men at arms length and only having one night stands so no one can get close. Until Ryan bumps into her life, the universe clearly having other ideas.  Katrina is taking back by his dazzling smile and cheeky personalty all the while she fears he is going to break down the things she has been guarding for years. Will the troubles from her past keep Katrina from her happily ever after? Or is she destined to repeat her past...
author: N.R. Hall
